macAddress.description: The MAC address for the ethernet port.

portIndex.description: The index of the port of the ethernet port.

name.description: The name for the ethernet port.

createdAt.description: The timestamp that the ethernet port get created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp that the ethernet get updated.

identityId.description: The identifier of the identity for the ethernet port.

dpskPoolId.description: The identifier of the DPSK pool associated with the group.

macRegistrationPoolId.description: The identifier of the MAC registration pool associated with the group.

propertyId.description: Then identifier of the property associated with the group.

createdAt.description: The timestamp that the group get created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp that the group get last update.

certificateTemplateId.description: Then identifier of the certificate template associated with the group.

policySetId.description: The identifier of the policy set associated with the group.

networkCount.description: The number of the networks associated with the group.

personalIdentityNetworkId.description: The identifier of the personal identity network associated with the group.

identityCount.description: The number of identities belongs to the group.

recentStatus.description: The latest status for the device.

hasMacRegistered.description: Determine if the device has registered for MAC authentication.

lastSeenAt.description: The latest timestamp that the device was seen.

createdAt.description: The timestamp that the device get created.

updatedAt.description: The latest timestamp that the device get updated.

identityId.description: The identifier of the identity that the device belongs to.

groupId.description: The identifier of the group for the identity.

parentId.description: The identifier of the parent identity.

dpskGuid.description: The identifier of the DPSK for the identity.

dpskPassphrase.description: The passphrase associated with the identity. If this field is set to null in an update request, the passphrase will be reset. Note: if a passphrase is provided but is shorter than the required minimum length, it will also be reset.

identityId.description: The identifier of entity that associated with identity.

revoked.description: The field to determine if identity is revoked.

createdAt.description: The timestamp that the identity get created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp that the identity get last updated.

devices.description: The list of devices for the identity.

deviceCount.description: The count of devices belongs to the identity.

ethernetPorts.description: The list of ethernet port for the identity.

switches.description: The list of switch for the identity.

meteringProfileId.description: The identifier of the metering profile.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date for the metering profile of this identity.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number for the identity.

externalIdentityId.description: The identifier of the external identity for the identity.

lastLoginAt.description: The latest timestamp that the identity login.

macAddress.description: The MAC address for the switch.

portId.description: The identifier of the port for the switch.

identityId.description: The identifier of the identity for the switch.

id.description: The identifier for the external identity.

userId.description: The identifier from identity provider for the external identity.

identityProviderId.description: The identifier for the identity provider.

identityProviderType.description: The type of the identity provider.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number for the external identity.

firstName.description: The first name for the external identity.

lastName.description: The last name for the external identity.

displayName.description: The display name for the external identity.

email.description: The email for the external identity.

roles.description: The roles for the external identity.

items.description: The roles for the external identity.

groups.description: The groups for the external identity.

items.description: The groups for the external identity.

createdAt.description: The timestamp that the external identity created.

address.description: The address for the external identity.

title.description: The title for the external identity.

organization.description: The organization for the external identity.

department.description: The department for the external identity.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name for the external identity.
